name: Omar El-Hassan
summary_blurb: Omar El-Hassan is a Quantitative Developer with experience in the financial sector, specializing in quantitative strategies. He has developed and implemented models and features for trading desks, utilizing programming languages such as C++ and Python. His educational background includes a Master's degree in Quantitative Finance and a Diplôme d'Ingénieur in Financial Engineering.
education_highlight: Master's degree in Quantitative Finance from Universite Lyon
